review.reviewBody: The butter chicken was delicious with medium spice. Just the right amount of pep without overpowering the taste. This has become an absolute favorite meal thanks to your food. I will happily come back next time we visit Surrey.
Yummy hit and fresh Indian food. Great portion for the dal
Portion sizes could be better, naan is a bit tough. Otherwise very tasty.
First time trying this restaurant. I recommend this to everyone. Their food is such great quality. It can be hard to find great Indian restaurants in cloverdale, but this one won't disappoint.
i ordered Paneer malai methi that was delicious and Amritsari kulcha and chana amazing. Love it . definately oreder nxt time . highly recomend.
